title: Poké Corpus {{version}}

error.title: An error occurred
error.message: Check your browser's developer console for additional information, and please report the issue on GitHub.

options.network: The selected language could not be loaded. Please check your internet connection and try again.

searchModal.message: Approximately {{amount, number}} of data will be downloaded to perform your query. Would you like to continue?

statusModal.error: An error occurred. Check your browser's developer console for additional information, and please report the issue on GitHub.
statusModal.network: One or more files could not be loaded. Only partial results are shown. Please check your internet connection and try again.
statusModal.regex: The regular expression you entered was invalid. Check the syntax of your search query and try again.

boolean.parentheses: Your Boolean search query has missing or extra parentheses.
boolean.quote: Your Boolean search query has missing or extra quotation marks.
boolean.operand: Your Boolean search query is missing one or more operands. If you meant to search for "NOT", "AND", or "OR" literally, please enclose it in quotes.
boolean.empty: Your Boolean search query has no search keywords. If you meant to search for this text literally, please enclose it in quotes.
boolean.where: One of the languages specified in the WHERE clause was not recognized.

statusModal.noMatch: No files match the filters you have selected. Ensure that the games you selected were released in the languages you selected.

displayedRange.long_one: Displaying {{start, number}}–{{end, number}} of {{count, number}} result
displayedRange.long_other: Displaying {{start, number}}–{{end, number}} of {{count, number}} results

cacheAllModal.message: Are you sure you want to cache all files? (Download size: about {{amount, number}})

cacheAllFailedModal.message: One or more files could not be saved to the cache. Please check your internet connection and ensure you have enough free space.

clearCacheModal.message: Are you sure you want to clear the cache?

tagline: A tool to query the Pokémon corpus
